BrainHR PEGA Services

BrainHR Provides businesses with access to the latest PEGA technologies and tools to optimize their business operations. We offer our services and solutions for below Pega Modules

Customer Service: Pega Customer Service is a module provided by BrainHR that offers robust customer service solutions aimed at enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty. This module helps organizations deliver personalized customer service across multiple channels, including email, chat, phone, and social media. One of the key features of this module is its ability to provide a 360-degree view of customers, enabling businesses to understand customer behavior and preferences better offering efficient case management, enabling businesses to manage customer inquiries and issues effectively. It also includes knowledge management features, allowing businesses to provide customers with relevant information quickly and easily. The module's self-service capabilities enable customers to resolve issues independently, further reducing the workload on customer service teams and acts an excellent solution for businesses looking to enhance their customer service capabilities. It offers a comprehensive suite of features that enable businesses to deliver personalized customer service, streamline case management, and provide customers with quick access to relevant information.

Pega Sales Automation: BrainHR's Pega Sales Automation module is a powerful solution that helps businesses streamline their sales processes and increase sales productivity. By automating routine tasks, sales teams can focus on more strategic activities, such as building relationships with clients and closing deals. The module leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to provide advanced sales automation capabilities, such as lead scoring, guided selling, and personalized offers. With lead scoring, sales teams can identify high-quality leads and prioritize their efforts accordingly. Guided selling provides sales reps with personalized recommendations and guidance to help them close deals faster. Finally, the personalized offers feature enables businesses to create customized offers and incentives that are tailored to individual customers. Overall, BrainHR's Pega Sales Automation module is an essential tool for businesses looking to optimize their sales processes and drive revenue growth.

Pega Marketing Automation: BrainHR offers Pega Marketing, which is a module designed to help businesses create targeted marketing campaigns that engage customers across multiple channels. With this module, organizations can leverage advanced analytics and real-time decisioning to optimize their marketing efforts and drive customer engagement. Pega Marketing enables organizations to create data-driven, personalized marketing campaigns that are tailored to individual customer needs and preferences. This module uses artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to analyze customer data and provide real-time recommendations for personalized offers and content. With Pega Marketing, businesses can improve their customer acquisition and retention rates, boost customer engagement, and drive revenue growth.

Pega Robotic Automation: BrainHR's Pega Robotics module provides advanced Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions that can automate repetitive, time-consuming tasks and improve operational efficiency. With this module, businesses can easily create software robots that can perform tasks like data entry, data extraction, and form filling, among others. The Pega Robotics module integrates with other Pega modules, enabling organizations to create end-to-end automation solutions that streamline processes and reduce costs. The module offers an intuitive user interface that allows businesses to design and implement robotic workflows with ease. It also provides advanced analytics and real-time insights, allowing businesses to optimize their robotic processes and improve overall efficiency. Overall, Pega Robotics is an essential tool for businesses looking to improve productivity, reduce costs, and enhance customer experience.

Pega Decision Management: Pega Decision Management is a module that enables organizations to make data-driven decisions in real-time using advanced analytics and machine learning. This module offered by BrainHR enables businesses to automate and manage business decisions, improve operational efficiency, and enhance customer experience. With Pega Decision Management, businesses can create decision strategies that deliver personalized customer experiences in real-time. It offers predictive analytics and adaptive models that help businesses optimize customer interactions. The module's advanced decisioning capabilities enable businesses to automate complex decision-making processes, reducing the risk of errors and increasing operational efficiency. BrainHR's Pega Decisioning module is a powerful tool for businesses looking to leverage data-driven decision-making to optimize their operations and enhance customer experience.

Pega Digital Process Automation: BrainHR provides Pega Digital Process Automation services that enable organizations to streamline their business processes, improve efficiency, and enhance customer experience. Pega's BPM platform automates and optimizes business processes, integrates with enterprise systems, and provides real-time analytics and insights to drive business decisions. BrainHR's team of Pega certified professionals can help organizations develop and deploy custom solutions that are tailored to their specific business needs. With BrainHR's Pega DPA services, organizations can transform their operations, accelerate time-to-market, and achieve higher levels of customer satisfaction. From process discovery to implementation, BrainHR's Pega DPA services cover the entire lifecycle of process automation and enable organizations to stay ahead in today's fast-paced digital economy.

Pega Workforce Intelligence: BrainHR uses Pega Workforce Intelligence as a tool that provides insight into an organization's workforce by collecting and analyzing data from various sources. It helps businesses to understand how their workforce is performing, identify areas for improvement, and make informed decisions based on data-driven insights. Pega Workforce Intelligence collects data from various sources such as employee records, productivity tools, and applications used in the workplace. It then analyzes the data using machine learning and other advanced analytics techniques to identify patterns, trends, and anomalies. The tool presents the insights in an easy-to-use dashboard that provides a comprehensive view of an organization's workforce. With Pega Workforce Intelligence, businesses can optimize their workforce by identifying areas for improvement and implementing changes to drive performance, efficiency, and productivity. The tool also helps organizations to improve employee engagement by identifying factors that impact engagement and taking steps to address them. Overall, Pega Workforce Intelligence is an essential tool for any organization that wants to optimize its workforce and stay ahead in today's competitive business environment.

Pega Chat and Co-Browse: BrainHR offers Pega Chat and Co-Browse services that help businesses provide real-time customer support by enabling chat functionality and co-browsing capabilities. With Pega Chat, customers can easily engage with businesses by chatting with customer service agents in real-time. The chat function can be easily integrated into a company's website or mobile app, allowing customers to ask questions, receive support, and get help with their concerns quickly and efficiently. We use Pega Co-Browse service to enable businesses to co-browse with their customers, allowing agents to see exactly what customers are seeing on their screens. This makes it easier for agents to provide personalized and targeted support, as well as to identify and resolve customer issues more quickly. Pega Co-Browse is fully customizable, allowing businesses to tailor the experience to their specific needs and to maintain control over the customer experience. BrainHR's Pega Chat and Co-Browse services help businesses improve customer satisfaction, increase engagement, and build better customer relationships.

Pega Customer Decision Hub: Pega Customer Decision Hub is a service offered by BrainHR that provides businesses with the capability to deliver personalized customer experiences across all channels. This module is designed to enable organizations to make real-time decisions based on customer interactions, preferences, and behaviors. Pega Customer Decision Hub uses advanced analytics and machine learning to analyze customer data and provide real-time recommendations for personalized offers and content. This service integrates with other Pega modules to provide end-to-end customer engagement solutions. With Pega Customer Decision Hub, businesses can improve customer satisfaction and loyalty, while also increasing revenue and efficiency. BrainHR's team of experts can assist businesses in implementing and utilizing Pega Customer Decision Hub to deliver personalized experiences that drive customer engagement and loyalty.

Pega Field Service: BrainHR offers Pega Field Service as a module to enable organizations to optimize their field service operations. This module provides end-to-end field service management capabilities, including scheduling, dispatching, and managing work orders. It offers real-time visibility into field operations, enabling organizations to optimize resource utilization and improve field service productivity. Pega Field Service also provides a mobile app for field technicians to access work orders, customer information, and knowledge articles on the go. This module integrates with other Pega modules, such as customer service and marketing, to provide a comprehensive field service solution. It uses AI-powered capabilities to improve first-time fix rates, reduce service time, and increase customer satisfaction. BrainHR's Pega Field Service module can help organizations deliver exceptional field service experiences and increase operational efficiency.

Pega Knowledge Management: BrainHR provides Pega Knowledge Management, a module that enables organizations to capture and manage knowledge across their business operations. This module offers a centralized repository of knowledge that can be accessed by employees and customers across multiple channels. Pega Knowledge Management enables organizations to create and manage knowledge articles, FAQs, and guides. The module also provides real-time recommendations to agents and customers, helping them find the information they need quickly and easily. It also allows organizations to measure the effectiveness of their knowledge base, track usage and performance, and optimize content accordingly. Pega Knowledge Management helps organizations to improve efficiency, reduce response time, and enhance customer satisfaction by providing accurate and relevant information.

Pega Customer Onboarding: BrainHR offers Pega Customer Onboarding services to help businesses onboard customers quickly and efficiently. This module enables organizations to deliver a seamless onboarding experience to new customers, reducing time to value and improving customer satisfaction. With Pega Customer Onboarding, businesses can automate the onboarding process, manage customer data, and ensure compliance with regulations. This module offers a personalized and contextually relevant onboarding experience by leveraging customer data and providing real-time recommendations. Pega Customer Onboarding enables businesses to accelerate customer onboarding, reduce operational costs, and improve customer retention. BrainHR's team of experts can help businesses implement and customize Pega Customer Onboarding to meet their unique business needs and ensure a successful onboarding process.

Pega Customer Experience Management: Pega Customer Experience Management is a module provided by BrainHR that enables organizations to deliver personalized and seamless customer experiences across multiple channels. This module offers a 360-degree view of customers, enabling businesses to understand customer needs and preferences to create targeted and relevant experiences. It offers real-time analytics and decisioning capabilities to optimize customer interactions and increase customer satisfaction. The module also offers self-service capabilities, enabling customers to find answers to their queries quickly and easily. With Pega Customer Experience Management, organizations can improve customer loyalty and increase revenue by delivering exceptional customer experiences. BrainHR's team of experts can help businesses implement and customize the module to meet their specific needs and requirements, ensuring that they can maximize their return on investment.

Pega Process Fabric: BrainHR offers Pega Process Fabric, a platform that enables organizations to connect and orchestrate their business processes across multiple systems and applications. Pega Process Fabric provides a unified view of processes and data, enabling organizations to streamline their operations and enhance customer experience. This platform offers low-code integration capabilities, allowing businesses to easily connect their existing systems and applications without the need for extensive coding or IT resources. Pega Process Fabric provides real-time visibility into process performance, enabling organizations to identify and resolve issues before they impact their operations. This platform also offers collaboration and communication tools, allowing teams to work together seamlessly across different departments and systems. Overall, Pega Process Fabric helps organizations improve operational efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance customer experience by streamlining their business processes and integrating their existing systems and applications.

Pega Process AI: Pega Process AI is a module offered by BrainHR that enhances business processes with artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities. This module enables organizations to leverage AI for process automation, decision-making, and optimization. Pega Process AI provides intelligent automation solutions that enable organizations to automate complex, repetitive, and manual tasks. It uses machine learning and natural language processing (NLP) to automate decision-making, providing real-time recommendations for actions based on data analysis. Additionally, it offers process optimization capabilities, enabling organizations to identify and fix bottlenecks in their processes to improve efficiency and reduce costs. With Pega Process AI, businesses can streamline their operations and improve their overall performance by leveraging the power of AI.

Pega Cloud Services: Pega Cloud Services, offered by BrainHR, provides a secure and scalable cloud environment for Pega applications. With Pega Cloud Services, businesses can focus on their core operations while leaving the technical aspects of application deployment and management to BrainHR's experts. The cloud infrastructure is designed to provide high availability and disaster recovery capabilities, ensuring business continuity. Pega Cloud Services is also compliant with industry standards and regulations, including GDPR and PCI DSS. BrainHR's team of certified Pega professionals ensures that the cloud environment is optimized for Pega applications, providing 24/7 support and monitoring. This enables businesses to scale their Pega applications and handle fluctuations in demand without worrying about infrastructure limitations. Overall, Pega Cloud Services provides a cost-effective, reliable, and flexible solution for businesses to run their Pega applications in the cloud.

Pega Infinity Platform: The Pega Infinity Platform is a comprehensive platform offered by BrainHR for building enterprise-level applications that automate business processes and deliver personalized customer experiences. It provides a unified architecture that connects people, processes, data, and systems across the organization. The platform offers low-code development capabilities, enabling businesses to create applications quickly and easily without requiring extensive coding knowledge. The Pega Infinity Platform includes various modules and tools for automating business processes, managing customer data, and delivering personalized customer experiences, such as Pega Customer Service, Pega Sales Automation, Pega Marketing, Pega Robotics, Pega Decision Management, and Pega Field Service. The platform also includes advanced AI capabilities such as natural language processing and machine learning, enabling businesses to automate complex decision-making processes and provide real-time insights. With the Pega Infinity Platform, businesses can streamline their operations, improve customer experience, and drive digital transformation.

According to a recent report by MarketsandMarkets, the global PEGA services market size is expected to reach USD 8.54 billion by 2025, growing at a CAGR of 12.9% during the forecast period. This highlights the growing trend towards outsourcing PEGA services as businesses look for ways to optimize their operations and remain competitive in their respective markets. With BrainHR PEGA Services, you can be confident that you are partnering with a service provider that has the expertise and experience to help you achieve your goals and drive innovation in your organization.
